pr_title: Avoid many error messages for copybook downloading

timeline.bodyText: 'DoneAnalysisEvent' sounds a little strange, but still applicable. Maybe, something like `AnalysisFinishedEvent' would be more descriptive?
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: I was inspired by the RunAnalysisEvent. In fact, I'm also don't like this name. I'll change it to AnalysisFinishedEvent.
replies.author: grianbrcom

replies.bodyText: AnalysisFinishedEvent --> AnalysisCompletionEvent we use Completion term in lsp
replies.author: asatklichov

replies.bodyText: Completion in LSP is only for the autocomplete feature
replies.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: In fact, it more a signal event, not really a data transfer object
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: By the agreement, the method Javadoc should start with a verb
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.message:
fix: Avoid many error messages for copybook downloading #384

The middleware process two calls: resolve URI and download copybook.
The server synchronously resolves URI copybooks, not in the server cache
during document analysis. After the scan, the server sends one call to
middleware with a list of copybooks to download.
DoneAnalysisEvent was added to the databus.

Closes #384

Signed-off-by: Anton Grigorev <anton.grigorev@broadcom.com>
